body:
Comment 2 by **lixin3811**: 
Thanks on bradfitz@golang.org
I modify the code, as follow:
                var _, ok = fmt.Scanf("%d,%d", &n, &m)
		if ok != nil {
			fmt.Println(ok)
		}
That is the result on the console:
1,2
unexpected newline
3,4
please, can you tell me why i got 'unexpected newline'?
